src: ସେ ଆହୁରି ମଧ୍ୟ କହିଛନ୍ତି ଯେ, ‘‘ଆମର ବର୍ତ୍ତମାନ 4 ମାସର ମୂଷା ଅଛି, ଯିଏ ମଧୁମେହ ଆକ୍ରାନ୍ତ ନୁହେଁ, ଯିଏ ପୂର୍ବରୁ ମଧୁମେହରେ ଆକ୍ରାନ୍ତ ଥିଲା।"
mt: 4 months old mice are not affected by diabetes, who were previously affected by diabetes.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: ନୋଭା ସ୍କୋଶିଆର ହାଲିଫ୍ୟାକ୍ସର ଡଲହାଉସୀ ବିଶ୍ୱବିଦ୍ୟାଳୟର ମେଡିସିନ୍ ପ୍ରଫେସର ତଥା କାନାଡୀୟ ଡାଇବେଟିସ୍ ଆସୋସିଏଶନ୍‌ର କ୍ଲିନିକଲ୍ ଏବଂ ବୈଜ୍ଞାନିକ ବିଭାଗର ଅଧ୍ୟକ୍ଷ ଡଃ. ଏହୁଦ୍ ଉର୍ ସତର୍କ କରିଛନ୍ତି କି, ଗବେଷଣା ତଥାପି ଏହାର ପ୍ରାରମ୍ଭିକ ଦିନରେ ଅଛି।
mt: Nova Scotia's Halifax-based Dalhousie University medical professor and head of the Clinical and Scientific Division of the Canadian Diabetes Association Dr. Ehuud Ur Satark has warned that, despite research, it is still in its early days.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: ଅନ୍ୟ କେତେକ ବିଶେଷଜ୍ଞଙ୍କ ପରି, ପୂର୍ବରୁ ଟାଇପ୍ 1 ଡାଇବେଟିସ୍ ଥିବା ଲୋକଙ୍କ ପାଇଁ ଏହି ଆବିଷ୍କାରଗୁଡ଼ିକର କୌଣସି ପ୍ରାସଙ୍ଗିକତା ନଥିବା କଥା ଉଲ୍ଲେଖ କରି ସେ ମଧ୍ୟ ଡାଇବେଟିସର ଆରୋଗ୍ୟସିଦ୍ଧତାକୁ ନେଇ ସନ୍ଦେହ ପ୍ରକାଶ କରିଛନ୍ତି।
mt: Other experts, including those who previously had Type 1 diabetes, have also noted that there is no evidence that the findings have any relevance to the cure of diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: ସୋମବାରକୁ, ସ୍ୱେଡିଶ୍ ଏକାଡେମୀର ସାହିତ୍ୟ ପାଇଁ ନୋବେଲ କମିଟୀର ସ୍ଥାୟୀ ସଚିବ, ସାରା ଡାନିୟସ୍, ସ୍ୱିଡେନ୍‌ର ସେଭେରିଜ୍ ରେଡିଓରେ ଏକ ପ୍ରୋଗ୍ରାମ୍‍ ବେଳେ ସାର୍ବଜନୀନ ଘୋଷଣା କରିଛନ୍ତି କି, ସାହିତ୍ୟରେ 2016 ନୋବେଲ ପୁରସ୍କାର ଜିତିବାକୁ ନେଇ ବବ୍ ଡାଇଲାନ୍‌ଙ୍କୁ ପ୍ରତ୍ୟକ୍ଷ ଭାବେ ଯୋଗାଯୋଗ କରିପାରିନଥିଲେ, ତାଙ୍କ ପାଖରେ ପହଞ୍ଚିବା ପାଇଁ ଏହାର ପ୍ରୟାସକୁ ସେ ପରିତ୍ୟାଗ କରିଦେଇଥିଲେ।
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, announced on a Swedish radio program that she had given up on her efforts to reach Bob Dylan, who had won the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: ଡାନିୟସ୍‍ କହିଲେ, "ବର୍ତ୍ତମାନ ଆମେ କିଛି କରୁନାହୁଁ।" ମୁଁ ତାଙ୍କର କ୍ଲୋଜେଟ୍‍ କୋଲାବରେଟରଙ୍କୁ କଲ୍‍ କରିଛି ଓ ମେଲ୍‍ ପଠାଇଛି ଏବଂ ବହୁତ ବନ୍ଧୁତ୍ୱପୂର୍ଣ୍ଣ ଉତ୍ତର ପାଇଛି। ବର୍ତ୍ତମାନ ପାଇଁ, ଏହା ନିଶ୍ଚୟ ଯଥେଷ୍ଟ।"
mt: "We're doing nothing right now," I said. I've called their cluster coordinator, sent an email, and gotten a lot of friendly responses. For now, this is certainly enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: ଏହା ପୂର୍ବରୁ, ରିଙ୍ଗ’ର CEO ଜାମୀ ସିମିନୋଫ୍ ମନ୍ତବ୍ୟ ଦେଇଛନ୍ତି ଯେ, ଯେତେବେଳେ ତାଙ୍କ ଗ୍ୟାରେଜରେ ଥିବା ଦୋକାନରୁ ଡୋର୍ ବେଲ୍ ଶୁଭୁନଥିଲା, ସେତେବେଳେ ତାଙ୍କର କମ୍ପାନୀ ଆରମ୍ଭ ହୋଇଥିଲା।
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff said that when the doorbell at his store was not ringing, his company was just getting started.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: ସେ ୱାଇଫାଇ ଡୋର୍ ବେଲ୍ ନିର୍ମାଣ କରିଥିବା କହିଛନ୍ତି।
mt: She designed the Wi-Fi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: ସିମିନଫ୍ କହିଛନ୍ତି ଯେ, 2013 ରେ ଏକ ସାର୍କ ଟ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ଅଧ୍ୟାୟରେ ଦେଖାଯିବା ପରେ ବିକ୍ରି ବୃଦ୍ଧି ପାଇଲା, ଯେଉଁଠାରେ ଶୋ’ ପ୍ୟାନଲ୍ ଷ୍ଟାର୍ଟଅପ୍ ପାଇଁ ପାଣ୍ଠି ପ୍ରଦାନ କରିବାକୁ ମନାକରିଦେଇଥିଲା।
mt: 2013 ରେ ଏକ ସାର୍କ ଟ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ଅଧ୍ୟାୟରେ ଦେଖାଯିବା ପରେ ବିକ୍ରି ବୃଦ୍ଧି ପାଇଲା, ଯେଉଁଠାରେ ଶୋ’ ପ୍ୟାନଲ୍ ଷ୍ଟାର୍ଟଅପ୍ ପାଇଁ ପାଣ୍ଠି ପ୍ରଦାନ କରିବାକୁ ମନାକରିଦେଇଥିଲା।
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 2017ର ଶେଷବେଳକୁ ସିମିନଫ୍ ସପିଂ ଟେଲିଭିଜନ ଚ୍ୟାନେଲ QVC ରେ ଦେଖାଦେଲା।
mt: 2017ର ଶେଷବେଳକୁ ସିମିନଫ୍ ସପିଂ ଟେଲିଭିଜନ ଚ୍ୟାନେଲ QVC ରେ ଦେଖାଦେଲା।
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: ରିଙ୍ଗ ମଧ୍ୟ ପ୍ରତିଦ୍ୱନ୍ଦୀ ସୁରକ୍ଷା କମ୍ପାନୀ, ADT କର୍ପୋରେସନ ସହ ଏକ ମକଦ୍ଦମାର ସମାଧାନ କରିଥିଲା।
mt: Ringing in the middle of the competitor security company, ADT Corporation with a lawsuit.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: ଇବୋଲା ମୃତ୍ୟୁହାରକୁ ଗୋଟିଏ ପରୀକ୍ଷାମୂଳକ ଟିକା ହ୍ରାସ କରିବାରେ ସକ୍ଷମ ହୋଇଥିବାବେଳେ, ପୂର୍ବରୁ ଥିବା ସଂକ୍ରମଣର ଚିକିତ୍ସା ପାଇଁ କୌଣସି ଔଷଧ ଉପଯୁକ୍ତ ବୋଲି ବର୍ତ୍ତମାନ ପର୍ଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ସ୍ପଷ୍ଟ ଭାବରେ ପ୍ରଦର୍ଶିତ ହୋଇନାହିଁ।
mt: While the vaccine has been shown to reduce mortality from Ebola, no drug has yet been shown to be effective in treating the disease.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: 1 ଆଣ୍ଟିବଡି କକଟେଲ, ZMapp, ପ୍ରାରମ୍ଭରେ ଏହି କ୍ଷେତ୍ରରେ ସମ୍ଭାବନା ପ୍ରଦର୍ଶନ କରିଥିଲା, କିନ୍ତୁ ଔପଚାରିକ ଅଧ୍ୟୟନ ସୂଚାଇ ଦେଇଥିଲା ଯେ ମୃତ୍ୟୁ ପ୍ରତିହତ କରିବାରେ ଏହାର ଲାଭ କମ୍ ରହିଥିଲା।
mt: 1 anti-body cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in this area, but clinical trials indicated that it had little benefit in preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: ପାମ୍ ପରୀକ୍ଷଣରେ,ଜେଡମ୍ୟାପ ଏକ ନିୟନ୍ତ୍ରଣ ଭାବରେ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟ କଲା, ଅର୍ଥାତ୍ ବୈଜ୍ଞାନିକମାନେ ଏହାକୁ ଏକଧାର ରେଖା ଭାବରେ ବ୍ୟବହାର କଲେ ଏବଂ ଏହାକୁ ଅନ୍ୟ 3 ଟି ଚିକିତ୍ସା ସହିତ ତୁଳନା କଲେ।
mt: In a test, the map acted as a control, meaning that scientists used it as a reference and compared it to three other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: ଯୁକ୍ତରାଷ୍ଟ୍ର ଆମେରିକା ବ୍ୟାୟାମ ବିଦ୍ୟା ଆମେରିକା ଅଲିମ୍ପିକ୍ କମିଟିର ପତ୍ରକୁ ସମର୍ଥନ କରେ ଏବଂ ଆମର ସମସ୍ତ ଖେଳାଳିମାନଙ୍କ ପାଇଁ ଏକ ନିରାପଦ ପରିବେଶକୁ ପ୍ରୋତ୍ସାହିତ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ଅଲିମ୍ପିକ୍ ପରିବାରର ସମ୍ପୂର୍ଣ୍ଣ ଆବଶ୍ୟକତାକୁ ଗ୍ରହଣ କରେ।
mt: The United States Olympic Committee supports the letter and agrees that the entire Olympic family's needs for a safe environment must be met.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: ଆମେ USOC ର ବକ୍ତବ୍ୟ ସହିତ ସହମତ ଅଛୁ ଯେ ଆମର ଖେଳାଳୀ ମାନଙ୍କର ଏବଂ କ୍ଲବର ଇଚ୍ଛା, ଏବଂ ସେମାନଙ୍କର ଖେଳ, ନିର୍ଣ୍ଣୟ ପରିବର୍ତ୍ତେ ଆମ ସଂଗଠନ ମଧ୍ୟରେ ଅର୍ଥପୂର୍ଣ୍ଣ ପରିବର୍ତ୍ତନ ସହିତ ଆଗକୁ ବଢିବା ଦ୍ଵାରା ଉତ୍ତମ ଭାବରେ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟ କରାଯାଇପାରେ।
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that our athletes' and clubs' desire, and their sport, will be best served by a change that moves forward with a commitment to progress.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: ଲାରି ନାସାରଙ୍କ ଏପରି ଅପବ୍ୟବହାର, ଯାହା ତାଙ୍କଠାରୁ ରକ୍ଷା ପାଇଯାଇଥିବା ବ୍ୟକ୍ତିମାନଙ୍କ ଦ୍ୱାରା ବହୁତ ସାହସିକ ଭାବେ ବର୍ଣ୍ଣିତ, ତାହା କିପରି ଏତେ ଦିନ ଧରି ଲୁଚି ରହିପାରିଲା ସେହି କଥା ଜଣା ପଡ଼ିବା ପାଇଁ USA ଜିମ୍ନାଷ୍ଟିକ୍ସ ଏକ ନିରପେକ୍ଷ ଅନୁସନ୍ଧାନକୁ ସମର୍ଥନ କରୁଛି ଏବଂ ଯେକୌଣସି ଆବଶ୍ୟକୀୟ ଓ ଉପଯୁକ୍ତ ପଦକ୍ଷେପ ଗ୍ରହଣ କରୁଛି।
mt: NASA's apparent misbehavior, which was described by many of the people it rescued as courageous, has been supported by a neutral investigation and appropriate and necessary steps have been taken.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA ଜିମ୍ନାଷ୍ଟିକ୍ସ ଏବଂ USOCର ଲକ୍ଷ୍ୟ ସମାନ ଅଟେ — ଜିମନାଷ୍ଟିକ୍ସ ଓ ଅନ୍ୟାନ୍ୟ କ୍ରୀଡ଼ାକୁ ଯଥାସମ୍ଭବ ସୁରକ୍ଷିତ କରିବା, ଯାହା ଦ୍ୱାରା ଖେଳାଳିମାନେ ଏକ ନିରାପଦ, ସକାରାତ୍ମକ ଏବଂ କ୍ଷମତାସମ୍ପନ୍ନ ପରିବେଶରେ ସେମାନଙ୍କ ସ୍ୱପ୍ନ ପୂରା କରିପାରିବେ।
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC have the same goal — to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible, so that athletes can achieve their dreams in a safe, supportive and successful environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 1960 ଦଶକ ବ୍ୟାପୀ, ବ୍ରେଜେଜିନସ୍କି ପରାମର୍ଶଦାତା ଭାବରେ ଜନ୍ ଏଫ୍.କେନେଡିଙ୍କ ପାଇଁ ଏବଂ ତାହା ପରେ ଲିଣ୍ଡନ୍ ବି ଜନ୍‌ସନଙ୍କ ପ୍ରଶାସନରେ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟ କରିଥିଲେ।
mt: 1960s through, John F. Kennedy's military adviser and later in the administration of London B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 1976 ମସିହାରେ ଚୟନ ସମୟରେ ସେ କାର୍ଟରଙ୍କୁ ବୈଦେଶିକ ନୀତି ସମ୍ବନ୍ଧରେ ପରାମର୍ଶ ଦେଉଥିଲେ, ତା'ପରେ ହେନେରୀ କିସିଞ୍ଜରଙ୍କ ପରେ ସେ 1977ରୁ 1981 ପର୍ଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ଜାତୀୟ ସୁରକ୍ଷା ପରାମର୍ଶଦାତା (NSA) ଭାବରେ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟରତ ଥିଲେ।
mt: 1976, when he was asked about foreign policy, he gave advice, and then from 1977 to 1981, he served as the National Security Advisor.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: NSA ଭାବରେ, ସେ 1978 ମସିହାର କ୍ୟାମ୍ପ ଡାଭିଡ୍ ଆକର୍ଡ୍ସ, 1970 ଦଶକର ଶେଷ ଭାଗରେ US-ଚୀନର ସମ୍ପର୍କକୁ ସ୍ୱାଭାବିକ କରିବା, ଇରାନ ବିପ୍ଳବ ଯାହା ଫଳରେ 1979ରେ ଇରାନରେ ପଣବନ୍ଦୀ ସଙ୍କଟ ସୃଷ୍ଟି ହୋଇଥିଲା, ଏବଂ 1979 ମସିହାରେ ଆଫଗାନିସ୍ତାନ ଉପରେ ସୋଭିଏତ ଆକ୍ରମଣ ପରି ବିଶ୍ୱ ବ୍ୟାପାରଗୁଡ଼ିକର କୂଟନୈତିକ ପରିଚାଳନାରେ କାର୍ଟରଙ୍କ ସହାୟତା କରିଥିଲେ।
mt: As NSA, she oversaw the normalization of US-China relations in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution that led to the hostage crisis in 1979, the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979, and the Carter administration's foreign policy in the face of these events.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: ରିୟାନ୍ ଗୋସଲିଙ୍ଗ ଏବଂ ଏମା ଷ୍ଟୋନଙ୍କ ଅଭିନୀତ ଚଳଚ୍ଚିତ୍ର ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରମୁଖ ବର୍ଗରେ ନାମାଙ୍କନ ପ୍ରାପ୍ତ କରିଥିଲା।
mt: 2014 ଚଳଚ୍ଚିତ୍ର ପୁରସ୍କାର ପ୍ରଦାନ ସମୟରେ ରିୟାନ୍ ଗୋସଲିଙ୍ଗ ଏବଂ ଏମା ଷ୍ଟୋନଙ୍କ ଅଭିନୀତ ଚଳଚ୍ଚିତ୍ର ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରମୁଖ ବର୍ଗରେ ନାମାଙ୍କନ ପ୍ରାପ୍ତ କରିଥିଲା।
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: ଗୋସଲିଂ ଏବଂ ଷ୍ଟୋନ୍ ଯଥାକ୍ରମେ ଶ୍ରେଷ୍ଠ ଅଭିନେତା ଓ ଶ୍ରେଷ୍ଠ ଅଭିନେତ୍ରୀ ପାଇଁ ନାମାଙ୍କନ ଗ୍ରହଣ କରିଥିଲେ ।
mt: Gosling and Stone were named best actor and best actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: ଏଥିରେ ଶ୍ରେଷ୍ଠ ଚଳଚ୍ଚିତ୍ର, ନିର୍ଦ୍ଦେଶକ, ସିନେମାଟୋଗ୍ରାଫି, କଷ୍ଟ୍ୟୁମ ଡିଜାଇନ୍, ଫିଲ୍ମ-ଏଡିଟିଂ, ମୂଳ ସଙ୍ଗୀତ, ପ୍ରଡକ୍ସନ ଡିଜାଇନ୍, ସାଉଣ୍ଡ ସମ୍ପାଦନ, ସାଉଣ୍ଡ ମିକ୍ସିଂ ଏବଂ ମୂଳ ସ୍କ୍ରିନପ୍ଲେ ଭଳି ଅନ୍ୟ ନୋମିନେସନ ଅନ୍ତର୍ଭୁକ୍ତ ଅଛି।
mt: This includes best picture, director, cinematography, costume design, film editing, original score, production design, sound recording, sound mixing and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: ଚଳଚ୍ଚିତ୍ରର 2ଟି ଗୀତ, ଅଡିସନ୍ (ଦ ଫୁଲ୍‌ସ ହୁ ଡ୍ରିମ୍) ଏବଂ ସିଟି ଅଫ୍ ଷ୍ଟାର୍ସ ଶ୍ରେଷ୍ଠ ମୂଳ ଗୀତ ପାଇଁ ନାମାଙ୍କନ ଲାଭ କରିଥିଲେ। ଲାୟନ୍ସଗେଟ୍ ଷ୍ଟୁଡିଓ 26 ଟି ନାମାଙ୍କନ ଗ୍ରହଣ କରିଛି - ଅନ୍ୟ କୌଣସି ଷ୍ଟୁଡିଓ ଅପେକ୍ଷା ଅଧିକ।
mt: 2 songs from the film, "Adison" (The Flowers Who Dream) and "City of Stars" won the best original song awards. Lionsgate Studio has received 26 nominations - more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: ରବିବାର ବିଳମ୍ବିତ ରାତିରେ, ଆମେରିକାର ରାଷ୍ଟ୍ରପତି ଡୋନାଲ୍ଡ ଟ୍ରମ୍ପ, ପ୍ରେସ୍ ସଚିବଙ୍କ ମାଧ୍ୟମରେ ଘୋଷଣା କରିଛନ୍ତି ଯେ, US ସୈନ୍ୟବାହିନୀ ସିରିୟା ଛାଡ଼ିବେ ।
mt: On Friday night, US President Donald Trump, through his press secretary, announced that the US military will withdraw from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: ଏହା ଟ୍ରମ୍ପଙ୍କର ତୁର୍କୀର ରାଷ୍ଟ୍ରପତି ରେସିପ ତାୟାପ୍ ଇର୍ଡୋଗାନଙ୍କ ସହ ଫୋନ ବାର୍ତ୍ତାଳାପ ପରେ ଘୋଷଣା କରାଯାଇଥିଲା ।
mt: This was announced after a phone call between Trump and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: ତୁର୍କୀ ISIS ର ସେନା ମାନଙ୍କୁ ଧରିବା ଆରମ୍ଭ କରିଦେଇଥିଲା, ଯାହାକି ବକ୍ତବ୍ୟରେ କୁହାଯାଇଛି ଯେ, ୟୁରୋପୀୟ ରାଷ୍ଟ୍ରମାନେ ଦେଶକୁ ଫେରିବାକୁ ମନା କରି ଦେଇଛନ୍ତି।
mt: Turkey has begun detaining its ISIS soldiers, who have been told by their commanders that European countries have refused to let them return home.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: ଏହା କେବଳ କିଛି ଡାଇନସରଙ୍କର ଡେଣା ଥିଲା ବୋଲି ସୁନିଶ୍ଚିତ କରୁନାହିଁ, ଯେଉଁ ତତ୍ତ୍ୱ ପୂର୍ବରୁ ବ୍ୟାପକ ଭାବେ ଜଣା ଅଛି ଯାହା ରଙ୍ଗ ଏବଂ ଥ୍ରି-ଡାଇମେନ୍ସନାଲ୍ ବ୍ୟବସ୍ଥା ପରି ସାଧାରଣତଃ ଜୀବାଶ୍ମର ବିବରଣୀ ଦେଇନଥାଏ ।
mt: It was only a few days old, and not yet fully described, with a broad range of colors and a three-dimensional structure that was not typical of fossils.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: ବୈଜ୍ଞାନିକମାନେ କହିଛନ୍ତି ଯେ ଏହି ପଶୁଟିର ପରସମୂହ ଶୀର୍ଷରେ ପିଙ୍ଗଳ-ବାଦାମୀ ରଙ୍ଗର ଥିଲା ଯାହା ଈଷତ ପାଉଁଶିଆ କିମ୍ବା କାରୋଟିନଏଡ୍ ରଙ୍ଗର ତଳଭାଗରେ ଥିଲା।
mt: The scientists say the animal's head was covered in a pinkish-brown pigment, which is a form of eumelanin or carotene.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: ଏହି ଆବିଷ୍କାର ପକ୍ଷୀମାନଙ୍କ ଶରୀରରେ ପରର କ୍ରମବିକାଶ ବିଷୟରେ ମଧ୍ୟ ଅନ୍ତର୍ଦୃଷ୍ଟି ପ୍ରଦାନ କରେ।
mt: This discovery also sheds light on the evolution of the birds' bodies.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: ଡାଇନୋସରର ପରରେ ଭଲ ଭାବରେ ବିକଶିତ ହୋଇଥିବା ସାଫ୍ଟ ନାହିଁ, ଯାହାକୁ ରେଚିସ୍ କୁହାଯାଏ, କିନ୍ତୁ ଏହାର ଅନ୍ୟାନ୍ୟ ବୈଶିଷ୍ଟ୍ୟ ଅଛି - ବାର୍ବ ଏବଂ ବାରବୁଲ୍ - ସେଥିପାଇଁ ଗବେଷକମାନେ ଏହି ସିଦ୍ଧାନ୍ତରେ ପହଞ୍ଚିଛନ୍ତି ଯେ ଅନ୍ୟାନ୍ୟ ବୈଶିଷ୍ଟ୍ୟଗୁଡ଼ିକ ତୁଳନାରେ ରେଚିସ୍ ବିଳମ୍ବରେ ଘଟିଥିବା ଏକ ବିବର୍ତ୍ତିତ ବିକାଶ ହୋଇଥାଇପାରେ।
mt: Dinosaurs are not well known for their soft tissue, which is called keratin, but it does have other features - claws and claws - that researchers have reached the conclusion that this is a delayed development of a developing development.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: ଡେଣାର ଗଠନ ଏହା ଦର୍ଶାଉଛି ଯେ ସେଗୁଡ଼ିକ ଉଡାଜାହାଜରେ ବ୍ୟବହୃତ କରାଯାଇନଥିଲା ବରଂ ତାପମାତ୍ରା ନିୟନ୍ତ୍ରଣ କରିବାରେ ଓ ପ୍ରଦର୍ଶନରେ ବ୍ୟବହୃତ ହୋଇଥାଏ। ଗବେଷକମାନେ ଏହା ପରାମର୍ଶ ଦେଇଛନ୍ତି ଯେ, ଯଦିଓ ଏହା ଏକ କମ୍ ବୟସ୍କ ଡାଇନୋସରର ଲାଞ୍ଜ ଅଟେ କିନ୍ତ ନମୁନାରୁ ଛୋଟ ନୁହେଁ ଏହା ପରିପକ୍ଵ ଥିବା ପରି ଲାଗୁଛି ।
mt: This shows how it was not used in aircraft but in temperature control and display. Researchers have suggested that, although it is a small dinosaur's neck, it looks like a well-developed one.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: ଅନୁସନ୍ଧାନକାରୀ ପରାମର୍ଶ ଦିଅନ୍ତି ଯେ, ଯଦିଓ ଏହା ଯୁବ ଡାଇନସର ର ଲାଞ୍ଜ, ନମୁନାରେ ବୟସ୍କଙ୍କ ପ୍ଲୁମେଜ୍ ଦେଖାଯାଏ ଏବଂ ଗାଲ ତଳକୁ ନୁହେଁ।
mt: Researchers note that, although it is a young dinosaur's rib, the model shows an adult's plume and does not go down the throat.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: ଗତକାଲି ସକାଳେ ତୁର୍କୀର ଗାଜିଆଣ୍ଟେପ୍‌ ଠାରେ ପୋଲିସ ମୁଖ୍ୟାଳୟରେ ଘଟିଥିବା ଏକ କାର ବୋମା ବିସ୍ଫୋରଣରେ ଦୁଇଜଣ ପୋଲିସ ଅଫିସର ମୃତ୍ୟୁବରଣ କରିଛନ୍ତି ଏବଂ ଅନ୍ୟ କୋଡିଏଜଣରୁ ଅଧିକ ଲୋକ ଆହତ ହୋଇଛନ୍ତି।
mt: Two police officers were killed and more people were injured in a car bomb explosion at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: ରାଜ୍ୟପାଳଙ୍କ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟାଳୟ କହିଛି ଯେ ଆହତମାନଙ୍କ ମଧ୍ୟରୁ ଉଣେଇଶି ଜଣ ପୋଲିସ ଅଧିକାରୀ।
mt: 15 of the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: ଏହି ଆକ୍ରମଣ ପାଇଁ ଦାୟୀ ଡେଇସ୍ (ଆଇଏସଆଇଏଲ) ସନ୍ତ୍ରାସବାଦୀକୁ ସନ୍ଦେହ ସୃଷ୍ଟି ହୋଇଛି ବୋଲି ପୋଲିସ ପ୍ରକାଶ କରିଛି ।
mt: Police have said they suspect a terrorist for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: ଅନ୍ୟ ତାରକାଙ୍କ ଭଳି ସୂର୍ଯ୍ୟ ମଧ୍ୟ ସମାନ ମୌଳିକ ନୀତିରେ ପରିଚାଳନା ହେଉଥିବା ସେମାନେ ଜାଣିବାକୁ ପାଇଥିଲେ: ସିଷ୍ଟମରେ ଥିବା ସମସ୍ତ ତାରାମାନଙ୍କର କାର୍ଯ୍ୟକଳାପ ସେମାନଙ୍କର ଉଜ୍ଜ୍ୱଳତା, ଘୂର୍ଣ୍ଣନ ଏବଂ ଅନ୍ୟ କିଛି ଦ୍ୱାରା ପରିଚାଳିତ ହେଉଥିବା ଦେଖିବାକୁ ମିଳିଥିଲା।
mt: They learned that the other stars, like the sun, are also controlled by the same basic rules: the behavior of all the stars in the system is determined by their brightness, rotation and other factors.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: ଏକ ତାରାର ରସବି ସଂଖ୍ୟା ନିର୍ଣ୍ଣୟ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ପ୍ରକାଶ ଏବଂ ଘୂର୍ଣ୍ଣନକୁ ଏକା ସହିତ ବ୍ୟବହାର କରାଯାଇଥାଏ, ଯାହାକି ପ୍ଲାଜମା ପ୍ରବାହ ସହିତ ସମ୍ବନ୍ଧିତ ଅଟେ।
mt: A star's spectral classification is determined by its color index, which is the measured proportion of radiation emitted by a star at each wavelength. This is done by plotting a graph of intensity versus wavelength using a spectrophotometer, and then comparing the result with a theoretical spectrum to find a match.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: ରସ୍‌ବି ସଂଖ୍ୟା ଯେତେ ଛୋଟ ହେବ, ଚୁମ୍ବକୀୟ ଉତ୍‌କ୍ରମଣ ଅନୁସାରେ ନକ୍ଷତ୍ର ସେତେ କମ୍ ସକ୍ରିୟ ହେବ।
mt: The smaller the rubidium number, the less active the star will be according to magnetic activity.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: ତାଙ୍କର ଯାତ୍ରା ସମୟରେ, ଇୱାସାକି ଅନେକ ଥର ସମସ୍ୟାର ସମ୍ମୁଖୀନ ହୋଇଥିଲେ।
mt: During their journey, the Iwasa family faced many problems.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: ସେ ଡକାୟତଙ୍କ ଦ୍ୱାରା ଲୁଣ୍ଠିତ ହୋଇଥିଲେ, ତିବଦ୍ଦରେ ଜଳାତଙ୍କରେ ପୀଡ଼ିତ ଏକ କୁକୁର ଦ୍ୱାରା ଆକ୍ରମଣର ଶିକାର ହୋଥିଲେ, ନେପାଳରେ ବିବାହ କରିବାରୁ ବର୍ତ୍ତିଯାଇଥିଲେ ଏବଂ ଭାରତରେ ଗିରଫ ହୋଇଥିଲେ।
mt: He was kidnapped by bandits, attacked by a pack of dogs, and abducted by a groom from Nepal, and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n ଷ୍ଟାଣ୍ଡାର୍ଡ଼ ଉଭୟ 2.4Ghz ଏବଂ 5.0Ghz ସଂଚାର ଆବୃତିରେ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟ କରେ।
mt: 802.11n operates in both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequency bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: ଯଦି ବେସ ଷ୍ଟେସନରେ ଡୁଆଲ୍ ରେଡିଓ ରହିଥାଏ, ତେବେ ଏହା 802.11a, 802.11b ଏବଂ 802.11g ସହିତ ଏହାକୁ ବ୍ୟାକୱାର୍ଡ କମ୍ପାଟେବୁଲ୍ କରିବାକୁ ଦେବ।
mt: If a base station has dual radios, it can be backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11nର ବେଗ ତାର ପୂର୍ବବର୍ତ୍ତୀ ବେଗ ତୁଳନାରେ ଅତ୍ୟନ୍ତ ଦ୍ରୁତ ଯାହା ସେକେଣ୍ଡ ପ୍ରତି 600 ମେଗାବାଇଟ ଅଟେ ।
mt: 802.11n's speed is extremely fast, at about 600 megabits per second.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: ବିବାହିତ ଏବଂ ଦୁଇଟି ପ୍ରାପ୍ତବୟସ୍କ ସନ୍ତାନଙ୍କ ପିତା ହୋଇଥିବା ଡୁଭାଲ, ଏହି କାହାଣୀ ସହ ସମ୍ପୃକ୍ତ ଥିବା ମିଲରଙ୍କୁ ବିଶେଷ ପ୍ରଭାବିତ କରିନଥିଲେ।
mt: The father of the married and two adult children Duvall, who was related to the story, was not particularly affected by the Millers.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: ଯେତେବେଳେ ମନ୍ତବ୍ୟ ପଚରାଗଲା, ମିଲର୍ କହିଲେ, "ମାଇକ୍ ଶୁଣିବା ସମୟରେ ବହୁତ କଥାବାର୍ତ୍ତା କରନ୍ତି... ମୁଁ ପ୍ରସ୍ତୁତ ହେଉଥିଲି, ତେଣୁ ମୁଁ ପ୍ରକୃତରେ କିଛି ଶୁଣି ନାହିଁ ଯାହା କିଛି ସେ କହୁଥିଲେ।"
mt: "When I was listening, there was a lot of talking... I was ready, so I really didn't hear what he said."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: ହୁ କହିଛନ୍ତି ଯେ, "ଆମେ GDPର ପ୍ରତି ୟୁନିଟରେ ବାହାରୁଥିବା କାର୍ବନ ଡାଇଅକ୍ସାଇଡକୁ 2020 ସୁଦ୍ଧା 2005 ସ୍ତରରୁ କମାଇବାକୁ ଚେଷ୍ଟା କରିବୁ ।"
mt: He says, "We will try to reduce the carbon dioxide we emit per unit of GDP by 2005 levels by 2020."
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: ଚୀନ୍‌ର ଅର୍ଥନୈତିକ ଉତ୍ପାଦନକୁ ଆଧାର କରି ତାହା ପ୍ରସ୍ତୁତ କରାଯିବ ବୋଲି କହି ସେ କାଟଛାଣ୍ଟ ପାଇଁ କୌଣସି ଅଙ୍କ ସ୍ଥିର କରିନାହାଁନ୍ତି।
mt: China has not set any specific target for its steel production, which is based on its economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: ପ୍ରଥମେ ପ୍ରଦୂଷଣର ବନ୍ଦ କରନ୍ତୁ ତା’ପରେ ଏହାକୁ ଖାଲି କରିବା ଦିଗରେ ଚିନ୍ତା କରନ୍ତୁ ହୁଙ୍କ ଏହି ବାର୍ତା ବିକାଶଶୀଳ ଦେଶଗୁଡ଼ିକୁ ଉନ୍ନତି କରିବାରେ ଉତ୍ସାହିତ କରୁଛି ।
mt: First, stop pollution, then worry about cleaning it up. This message has inspired developing countries to move forward.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: ସେ ଏହା ମଧ୍ୟ କହିଛନ୍ତି, ସେମାନେ ଏହି ଦାଇତ୍ଵ ଗ୍ରହଣ କରିବାକୁ କୁହାଯିବା ଉଚିତ ନୁହେଁ ତଥାପି ତାଙ୍କର ବିକାଶ ପର୍ଯ୍ୟାୟ, ଦାୟିତ୍ୱ ଏବଂ କ୍ଷମତା ବାହାରକୁ ଯାଇ ସେମାନେ ଏହି କାର୍ଯ୍ୟପାଇଁ ଅନୁରୋଧ କରିପାରନ୍ତି ।
mt: She also says that they are not obliged to accept this responsibility, but that they can make a request to take up this work in their development, responsibility and capacity.
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: ଆଜି 12.00 GMTରେ ଇରାକ ଅଧ୍ୟୟନ ଗୋଷ୍ଠୀ ଏହାର ରିପୋର୍ଟ ପ୍ରସ୍ତୁତ କଲା।
mt: 12.00 GMT today, the Iraqi investigation group released its report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: ଏହା ଚେତାବନୀ ଦେଇଛି ଯେ ଏହି ସମୟରେ 1 ହେଲେ ଏହି କଥା ପାଇଁ ଗ୍ୟାରେଣ୍ଟି ଦେଇପାରିବେ ନାହିଁ ଯେ, ଏହି ବିନ୍ଦୁରେ ଇରାକରେ କୌଣସି ମଧ୍ୟ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟାନୁଷ୍ଠାନ ସାମ୍ପ୍ରଦାୟିକ କଲ୍ୟାଣକୁ ବନ୍ଦ କରି ବଢୁଥିବା ହିଂସା କିମ୍ବା ବିଶୃଙ୍ଖଳା ଆଡକୁ ଗତି କରିବ।
mt: 1. This is to advise that no claims will be accepted for any damage, loss or injury arising from any act of terrorism, violence or civil unrest in Iraq.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: ଖୋଲା ଯୁକ୍ତି ଏବଂ ମଧ୍ୟ ପୂର୍ବ ଦିଗରେ ନୀତି ବିଷୟରେ ଯୁକ୍ତରାଷ୍ଟ୍ର ଆମେରିକାରେ ଏକ ସହମତି ଗଠନ ପାଇଁ ନିବେଦନ ସହିତ ଏହି ରିପୋର୍ଟ ଖୋଲିଛି।
mt: This report is open for comments and suggestions with a view to a consensus formation in the United States of America on the issue of open source.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: ଏହି ରିପୋର୍ଟରେ ଇରାକ ପ୍ରତି କାର୍ଯ୍ୟକାରିଣୀର ବର୍ତ୍ତମାନର ନୀତିର ପ୍ରାୟ ପ୍ରତ୍ୟେକ ଦିଗକୁ ଅତ୍ୟନ୍ତ ସମାଲୋଚନା କରାଯାଇଛି ଏବଂ ଏଥିରେ ତୁରନ୍ତ ପରିବର୍ତ୍ତନ ଆଣିବା ପାଇଁ ଅନୁରୋଧ କରାଯାଇଛି।
mt: This report has been highly criticized for its lack of direction and has been called for immediate change.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: ଏହାର 78 ଟି ସୁପାରିଶ ଗୁଡ଼ିକ ମଧ୍ୟରେ ପ୍ରଥମ ହେଉଛି ଯେ ଶତ୍ରୁତାପୂର୍ଣ୍ଣ ହସ୍ତକ୍ଷେପ ବିରୁଦ୍ଧରେ ଇରାକର ସୀମାକୁ ସୁରକ୍ଷିତ ରଖିବା ଏବଂ ନିଜର ପଡ଼ୋଶୀ ଦେଶମାନଙ୍କ ସହିତ ରାଜନୈତିକ ସମ୍ପର୍କକୁ ପୁନଃସ୍ଥାପିତ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ଚଳିତ ବର୍ଷର ଶେଷ ପୂର୍ବରୁ ଏକ ନୂତନ ରାଜନୈତିକ ପଦକ୍ଷେପ ଗ୍ରହଣ କରାଯିବା ଉଚିତ।
mt: 78 recommendations include first that Iraq should take steps to secure its borders and restore political relations with its neighbors before the end of the year.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: ବର୍ତ୍ତମାନର ସିନେଟର୍ ତଥା ଆର୍ଜେଣ୍ଟିନାର ପ୍ରଥମ ମହିଳା କ୍ରିଷ୍ଟିନା ଫର୍ଣ୍ଣାଣ୍ଡିଜ୍ ଡି କିକନର୍ ଗତକାଲି ସନ୍ଧ୍ୟାରେ ବୁଏନ୍ସ ଏୟାର୍ସ‌ଠାରୁ 50 କିଲୋମିଟର (31 ମାଇଲ୍) ଦୂରରେ ଥିବା ଲା ପ୍ଲାଟାଠାରେ ରାଷ୍ଟ୍ରପତି ପ୍ରାର୍ଥୀ ଭାବେ ତାଙ୍କର ପ୍ରାର୍ଥୀତ୍ୱ ଘୋଷଣା କରିଛନ୍ତି।
mt: 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires, the capital, Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, the first female senator and former president of Argentina, announced her candidacy for president on Sunday evening.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: ଆର୍ଜେଣ୍ଟିନା ଥିଏଟର୍‌ରେ ଶ୍ରୀମତୀ କିର୍କନର୍ ରାଷ୍ଟ୍ରପତି ପ୍ରାର୍ଥୀ ହେବା ପାଇଁ ନିଜ ଅଭିପ୍ରାୟ ବ୍ୟକ୍ତ କରିଥିଲେ, ଏହି ସ୍ଥାନରୁ ସେ 2005ରେ ବ୍ୟୁନସ୍ ଏୟର୍ସ ପ୍ରାନ୍ତ ପ୍ରତିନିଧି ସଭ୍ୟ ଭାବରେ ମନ୍ତ୍ରୀସଭା ପାଇଁ ତାଙ୍କର ଯାତ୍ରା ଆରମ୍ଭ କରିଥିଲେ।
mt: 2005, she began her term as a member of the Buenos Aires Province legislature, representing the district of Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ଘୂର୍ଣ୍ଣିବାତ୍ୟା କ୍ୟାଟ୍ରିନା ପରବର୍ତ୍ତୀ ରିଲିଫ୍ ଓ ପୁନଃନିର୍ମାଣରେ କରାଯାଇଥିବା ଖର୍ଚ୍ଚକୁ ନେଇ ବିବାଦ ଯୋଗୁଁ ବିତର୍କର ସୂତ୍ରପାତ ହୋଇଥିଲା; ଯାହାକୁ ବ୍ୟଙ୍ଗାତ୍ମକ ଭାବରେ କିଛି ଆର୍ଥିକ ରକ୍ଷଣଶୀଳ "ବୁଶ୍‌ଙ୍କ ନ୍ୟୁ ଅରଲିନ୍ସ ଡିଲ୍" ଭାବେ ନାମ ଦେଇଛନ୍ତି।
mt: The storm relief and rebuilding costs were controversial, with some fiscally conservative "Bush's New Orleans" dubbed as such.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: ପୁନଃନିର୍ମାଣ ଚେଷ୍ଟାର ଉଦାରବାଦୀ ସମାଲୋଚନା ୱାଶିଂଟନ୍ ର ଅନ୍ତର୍ନିହିତ ସୂତ୍ରଗୁଡ଼ିକୁ ପୁନଃନିର୍ମାଣ ଚୁକ୍ତିନାମା ପ୍ରଦାନ କରିବା ଉପରେ ଧ୍ୟାନ ଦେଇଛି।
mt: The second attempt at rebuilding the contract has drawn criticism from liberal Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: ଶେଷକୃତ୍ୟରେ ଯୋଗ ଦେବାପାଇଁ 4 ନିୟୁତରୁ ଅଧିକ ଲୋକ ରୋମ ଯାଇଥିଲେ।
mt: 4 million people or more attended the final.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: ଏତେ ସଂଖ୍ୟାରେ ଲୋକମାନେ ସେଠାରେ ଉପସ୍ଥିତ ଥିଲେ ଯେ, ସେଣ୍ଟ ପିଟର୍ ସ୍କ୍ୱେର୍‌‌ରେ ହେଉଥିବା ଅନ୍ତ୍ୟେଷ୍ଟି କ୍ରିୟାରେ ସମସ୍ତଙ୍କ ପ୍ରବେଶ ଅସମ୍ଭବ ଥିଲା।
mt: So many people were present that all access to the funeral at St. Peter's Square was impossible.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: ଲୋକଙ୍କୁ ଉତ୍ସବ ଦେଖିବା ପାଇଁ ରୋମରେ ବିଭିନ୍ନ ସ୍ଥାନରେ ବଡ ବଡ ଟେଲିଭିଜନ ଲଗାଯାଇଥିଲା।
mt: For the occasion, large television screens were set up in various places in Rome.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: ଇଟାଲୀର ଅନ୍ୟ ଅନେକ ସହର ଏବଂ ବିଶ୍ଵର ଅବଶିଷ୍ଟ ଦେଶଗୁଡ଼ିକରେ, ବିଶେଷତଃ ପୋଲାଣ୍ଡରେ, ଏକାଭଳି ସେଟଅପ୍ ନିର୍ମାଣ କରାଯାଇଥିଲା, ଯାହାକୁ ବହୁ ସଂଖ୍ୟକ ଲୋକ ଦେଖିଥିଲେ।
mt: Similar steps were taken in other Italian cities and countries around the world, especially Poland, where many people saw it.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: ସଂସ୍ଥାର ସଫଳତା ହାର ବଢାଇବା ଉଦ୍ଦେଶ୍ୟରେ ଐତିହାସିକମାନେ ଅତୀତର FBI ନୀତିକୁ ସମାଲୋଚନା କରିଛନ୍ତି ଯାହାକି ସମାଧାନ କରିବା ସହଜ, ବିଶେଷକରି ଚୋରି ହୋଇଥିବା କାର ମାମଲା ଉପରେ ଧ୍ୟାନ ଦିଆଯାଇଥାଏ।
mt: In an effort to increase its success rate, some historians have criticized the FBI's policy of focusing on easy cases, especially stolen car cases.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: କଂଗ୍ରେସ 2005 ଆର୍ଥିକ ବର୍ଷରେ ଏହି ଅଶ୍ଳିଳ ପଦକ୍ଷେପକୁ ପାଣ୍ଠି ଯୋଗାଇବା ପ୍ରାରମ୍ଭ କରିଥିଲା ଏବଂ ତାହାର ନିର୍ଦ୍ଦେଶ ଅନୁଯାୟୀ, ଏଫ୍. ବି.ଆଇ. ଆଡଲ୍ଟ ପର୍ନୋଗ୍ରାଫୀ ପାଇଁ 10 ଜଣ ପ୍ରତିନିଧିଙ୍କୁ ନିଶ୍ଚିତ ଭାବେ ନିୟୋଜିତ କରିବ।
mt: 2005 was the first year Congress began funding this shameful practice, and as directed by the F.B.I., it hired 10 representatives to ensure adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: ରବିନ୍ ଉଥାପ୍ପା 11 ଟି ଚୌକା ଓ 2 ଛକା ମାରି 41 ଟି ବଲରେ 70 ରନ୍ କରିଥିଲେ।
mt: 11 wickets and 2 maidens, Robin Uthappa scored 41 runs in 70 balls.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: ମଧ୍ୟମ କ୍ରମର ବ୍ୟାଟ୍ସମ୍ୟାନ୍, ସଚିନ୍ ତେନ୍ଦୁଲକର ଓ ରାହୁଲ ଦ୍ରାବିଡ ଭଲ ପ୍ରଦର୍ଶନ କରିବା ସହ ଏକ ଶହ ରନ୍‌ର ସହଭାଗୀତା ଯୋଡ଼ିଥିଲେ।
mt: Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid contributed well to a 100-run partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: କିନ୍ତୁ, କପ୍ତାନଙ୍କ ୱିକେଟ୍‍ ହରାଇବା ପରେ ଇନିଂସ୍‍ ଶେଷ ହେବା ପର୍ଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ଭାରତ 7 ୱିକେଟ୍‍ ହରାଇ ମାତ୍ର 36 ରନ୍‍ କଲା।
mt: However, after losing their captain's wicket, India lost their last wicket before the innings ended, scoring 36 runs for the loss of 7 wickets.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: ଏସିଆ ର ସପ୍ତାହ ବ୍ୟାପୀ ଯାତ୍ରା ଆରମ୍ଭରେ ଆମେରିକା ରାଷ୍ଟ୍ରପତି ଜର୍ଜ ଡବ୍ଲ୍ୟୁ ବୁଶ ନଭେମ୍ବର 16, ସକାଳେ ସିଙ୍ଗାପୁରରେ ପହଞ୍ଚିଲେ।
mt: 16 November, morning, US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore to begin a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: ସିଙ୍ଗାପୁରର ଉପ ପ୍ରଧାନମନ୍ତ୍ରୀ ୱଙ୍ଗ୍ କାନ୍ ସେଙ୍ଗ୍ ତାଙ୍କର ସ୍ୱାଗତ କରିଥିଲେ ଏବଂ ପ୍ରଧାନମନ୍ତ୍ରୀ ଲୀ ସିଏନ୍ ଲୂଙ୍ଗଙ୍କ ସହ ସେ ବ୍ୟାପାର ଓ ଉଗ୍ରବାଦ ବିଷୟରେ ଆଲୋଚନା କରିଥିଲେ।
mt: Singapore's deputy prime minister, Weng Kan Seng, welcomed him and discussed business and extremism with Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: ଉପନିର୍ବାଚନରେ ପରାଜୟର ଏକ ସପ୍ତାହ ପରେ, ବୁଶ୍‍ ଏକ ଶ୍ରୋତାମଣ୍ଡଳୀକୁ ଏସିଆରେ ବାଣିଜ୍ୟର ବିସ୍ତାର ବିଷୟରେ କହିଲେ।
mt: A week after his election defeat, Bush told an audience in Asia about expanding trade.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: ମଙ୍ଗଳବାରରେ PMO ଠାରେ NDP ନେତା ଜ୍ୟାକ୍ ଲେଟନ୍‌ଙ୍କ ସହ 25 ମିନିଟର ସାକ୍ଷାତ ପରେ, ସରକାରଙ୍କର 'ସ୍ୱଚ୍ଛ ବାୟୁ ଅଧିନିୟମ'ର ଦ୍ୱିତୀୟ ପଠନ ପୂର୍ବରୁ, ଏହାକୁ ସମୀକ୍ଷା କରିବା ପାଇଁ ଏକ ସର୍ବଦଳୀୟ କମିଟୀ ନିକଟକୁ ପଠାଇବା ପାଇଁ ପ୍ରଧାନମନ୍ତ୍ରୀ ଷ୍ଟିଫେନ୍ ହାର୍ପର୍ ରାଜି ହୋଇଛନ୍ତି।
mt: On Monday, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton, the government agreed to send the "Clean Air Act" back to committee for review before a second reading, which is the second stage of a bill's passage through Parliament.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: ପ୍ରଧାନମନ୍ତ୍ରୀଙ୍କ ସହ ବୈଠକରେ ଲେଟନ୍ ରୁଢିବାଦୀଙ୍କ ପରିବେଶ ବିଲରେ ପରିବର୍ତ୍ତନ ଆଣିବାକୁ କହିଥିଲେ ଏବଂ କଞ୍ଜରଭେଟିଭ ଦଳର ପରିବେଶ ବିଲର "ପୁଙ୍ଖାନୁପୁଙ୍ଖ ଏବଂ ସମ୍ପୂର୍ଣ୍ଣ ପୁନଃଲିଖନ" ମାଗିଥିଲେ।
mt: In a meeting with the prime minister, the opposition leader said the environment bill should be changed and the government's environment bill was "too detailed and completely rewritten".
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: ତସ୍‌ମାନିଆର ଡେଭୋନପୋର୍ଟରେ ଥିବା ମର୍ସୀ ହସ୍ପିଟଲ୍‌ ପାଣ୍ଠିର ଦାୟିତ୍ୱ ନେବା ପାଇଁ କେନ୍ଦ୍ର ସରକାର ଆଗକୁ ଆସିବା ପରଠାରୁ ରାଜ୍ୟ ସରକାର ତଥା କିଛି କେନ୍ଦ୍ରୀୟ ସାଂସଦ, ନଭେମ୍ବର ସୁଦ୍ଧା କେନ୍ଦ୍ରୀୟ ନିର୍ବାଚନ ହେବାକୁ ଥିବାରୁ, ଏହା ଏକ ନିର୍ବାଚନୀ ଷ୍ଟଣ୍ଟ ବୋଲି କହିଛନ୍ତି।
mt: The federal government has been asked to take over the management of the Marsden Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, since the state government and some federal MPs, with the federal election due in November, have called it a political stunt.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: କିନ୍ତୁ ପ୍ରଧାନମନ୍ତ୍ରୀ ଜନ୍ ହାୱାର୍ଡ କହିଛନ୍ତି ଯେ, ଏହି କାର୍ଯ୍ୟ କେବଳ ଡାକ୍ତରଖାନାର ସୁବିଧାଗୁଡ଼ିକୁ ତସ୍‌ମାନିଆ ସରକାରଙ୍କ ଦ୍ଵାରା ଅନୁନ୍ନତ ମାନର ନ କରାଯିବା ପାଇଁ ଅତିରିକ୍ତ 45 ନିୟୁତ ଡଲାର୍ ପ୍ରଦାନ କରିଛି।
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the work would not be done by the Tasmanian government alone, with an extra $45 million in funding provided by the federal government.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: ନବୀନତମ ବୁଲେଟିନ୍ ଅନୁସାରେ, ସମୁଦ୍ର ସ୍ତରର ରିଡିଂ ରୁ ସୂଚନା ମିଳୁଛି ଯେ ସୁନାମି ସୃଷ୍ଟି ହୋଇଥିଲା। ପାଗୋ ପାଗୋ ଏବଂ ନିୟୁ ନିକଟରେ କିଛି ନିର୍ଦ୍ଦିଷ୍ଟ ସୁନାମି କାର୍ଯ୍ୟକଳାପ ରେକର୍ଡ କରାଯାଇଥିଲା।
mt: According to the latest bulletin, information from the sea level gauges indicate that a tsunami has been generated. Some specific tsunami activity has been recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: ଟୋଙ୍ଗାରେ କୌଣସି ବଡ଼ କ୍ଷୟ କିମ୍ବା କ୍ଷତି ହେବାର କୌଣସି ସୂଚନା ମିଳିନାହିଁ, କିନ୍ତୁ ପାୱାର ଅସ୍ଥାୟୀ ଭାବରେ ଚାଲିଯାଇଥିଲା, ଯାହାକି ଟୋଙ୍ଗାନ କର୍ତ୍ତୃପକ୍ଷଙ୍କୁ PTWC ଦ୍ଵାରା ଜାରି କରାଯାଇଥିବା ସୁନାମି ଚେତାବନୀ ଗ୍ରହଣ କରିବାକୁ ବାରଣ କରିଥିଲା।
mt: There was no immediate report of any major damage or loss, but the power was temporarily cut, which the Tongan government was advised by PTWC to take precautions against a tsunami warning.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: ସତର୍କ ସୂଚନା ପ୍ରତ୍ୟାହାର କରାଯିବା ପରେ ମଧ୍ୟ ହାୱାଇର ସମୁଦ୍ର ତଟରେ କିମ୍ବା ତାହା ନିକଟରେ ଅବସ୍ଥିତ ଚଉଦଟି ସ୍କୁଲ ବୁଧବାରରେ ବନ୍ଦ ଥିଲା।
mt: After a tsunami warning was issued, schools in the Hawaiian islands of Oahu, Maui, Kauai and Hawaii were closed on Wednesday.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: U.S. ରାଷ୍ଟ୍ରପତି ଜର୍ଜ W. ବୁଶ୍‍ ଏହି ଘୋଷଣାକୁ ସ୍ୱାଗତ କଲେ।
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed this announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: ବୁଶ୍‌ଙ୍କ ମୁଖପାତ୍ର ଗର୍ଡନ୍ନ୍ ଜୋଣ୍ଡ୍ରୋ ଉତ୍ତର କୋରିଆର ସଂକଳ୍ପ ବୋଲି କହିଛନ୍ତି ଯେ, "କୋରିଆ ଉପଦ୍ୱୀପର ନିରୀକ୍ଷଣ ପରମାଣୁ ମୁକ୍ତ କରିବା ଲକ୍ଷ୍ୟ ଦିଗରେ ଏକ ପ୍ରମୁଖ ପଦକ୍ଷେପ।"
mt: White House press secretary Gordon Johndroe said, "This is a significant step toward monitoring North Korea's nuclear-free status."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: ଆଜି ଉପକ୍ରାନ୍ତୀୟ ବାତ୍ୟା ଜେରୀ, ନାମକରଣ କରାଯାଇଥିବା ଆଟଲାଣ୍ଟିକ୍ ହରିକେନ୍ ସିଜନର ଦଶମ ଘୂର୍ଣ୍ଣିବଳୟ, ଆଟଲାଣ୍ଟିକ୍ ମହାସାଗରରେ ସୃଷ୍ଟି ହୋଇଛି।
mt: Today, the tenth named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, Jerry, was born in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: ଜାତୀୟ ଘୂର୍ଣ୍ଣିବଳୟ କେନ୍ଦ୍ର (NHC) କହିଛି ଯେ, ଏହି ସମୟରେ ଜେରୀ ଅବତରଣ କଲେ କୌଣସି ବିପଦ ନାହିଁ।
mt: The National Hurricane Center says there is no danger at this time if Jerry makes landfall.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: ଯୁକ୍ତରାଷ୍ଟ୍ରର କର୍ପ୍ସ ଅଫ୍ ଇଞ୍ଜିନିୟର୍ସର ଆକଳନ ଅନୁସାରେ, ପୂର୍ବରୁ କ୍ଷତିଗ୍ରସ୍ତ ହୋଇଥିବା ବନ୍ଧ, 6 ଇଞ୍ଚ ବର୍ଷା ହେଲେ ଭାଙ୍ଗିଯିବାର ସମ୍ଭାବନା ଅଛି।
mt: 6 inches of rain could cause the dam to break, according to a Corps of Engineers analysis.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: ଘୂର୍ଣ୍ଣିବାତ୍ୟା କ୍ୟାଟ୍ରିନା ସମୟରେ 20 ଫୁଟ ଉଚ୍ଚରେ ବନ୍ୟା ପରିସ୍ଥିତି ଦେଖିଥିବା ନବମ ୱାର୍ଡରେ ବର୍ତ୍ତମାନ ନିକଟସ୍ଥ ବନ୍ଧ ଉପରେ ଅଣ୍ଟା ଉଚ୍ଚରେ ପାଣି ଚାଲୁଛି।
mt: 20 feet above sea level, the ninth ward is currently seeing water rise over the nearby levee.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: ପାଣି 100 ଫୁଟ ଚଉଡା ଏକ ବିଭାଗରେ ସେତୁ ଉପରେ ଢାଳିହେଉଛି।
mt: 100 foot wide section of a dam is being filled with water.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: ସାଧାରଣ ପ୍ରଶାସକ ଆଦାମ କୁର୍ଡେନ ଗତ ମାସରେ ୱିକିନ୍ୟୁଜ ସହ କଥା ହେଲାବେଳେ ଡ଼ିଲିଟ ଉପରେ ଅସନ୍ତୋଷ ବ୍ୟକ୍ତ କରିଥିଲେ।
mt: General Manager Adam Kurdeh expressed his dissatisfaction with the site during a meeting with Wikimedia Foundation last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: ସେ [ୱେଲ୍ସ] ମୂଳତଃ ଆରମ୍ଭରୁ ଆମକୁ ମିଛ କହିଥଲେ। ପ୍ରଥମେ, ଏହା ଆଇନଗତ କାରଣରୁ ହୋଇଥିବା ପରି ଅଭିନୟ କରି। ଦ୍ଵିତୀୟରେ, ଠିକ୍ ତାଙ୍କ କଳାକୃତି ଅପସାରିତ ହେବା ପର୍ଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ସେ ଆମ କଥା ଶୁଣୁଥିବାର ଛଳନା କରି।
mt: [Wales]  originally told us to fuck off. First, it was acting as if it was a legal matter. Second, it was acting as if it was not listening to our words.
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: ସମୁଦାୟ ବିରକ୍ତିପ୍ରକାଶ କରିବା କାରଣରୁ ଯୌନ ସାମଗ୍ରୀ ସମ୍ପର୍କିତ ଏକ ନିୟମ ପ୍ରାରୂପ ପ୍ରସ୍ତୁତ କରିବାର ସାମ୍ପ୍ରତିକ ଚେଷ୍ଟାକୁ ଏହି ସାଇଟ୍ ରାସ୍ତା ଦେଖାଇଥିଲା, ଯାହା ଅନେକ ମୁକ୍ତ ଲାଇସେନ୍ସପ୍ରାପ୍ତ ମିଡିଆକୁ ପୋଷିତ କରିଥାଏ।
mt: This site was previously used to test a proposed rule on sexually explicit material, which was being tested by many free license media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: କରାଯାଇଥିବା କାର୍ଯ୍ୟ ପ୍ରାୟତଃ ତତ୍ତ୍ୱ ଆଧାରିତ ଥିଲା, କିନ୍ତୁ ପ୍ରୋଗ୍ରାମଟି ଧନୁ ରାଶି ନୀହାରିକା ବିଷୟରେ କରାଯାଇଥିବା ପର୍ଯ୍ୟବେକ୍ଷଣକୁ ସିମୁଲେଟ୍ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ଲେଖାଯାଇଥିଲା।
mt: The program was based on the theory, but the program was written to simulate the observations made of the constellation of Orion.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: ଯେପରି ଚନ୍ଦ୍ରର ଆକର୍ଷଣ ଶକ୍ତି ପ୍ରଭାବରେ ପୃଥିବୀରେ ଜୁଆର ସୃଷ୍ଟି ହୁଏ, ସେପରି ଆକାଶଗଙ୍ଗା ମଧ୍ୟ ଧନୁ ରାଶି ନୀହାରିକାକୁ ପ୍ରଭାବିତ କରିଥାଏ।
mt: As the moon's gravitational pull creates tides on Earth, so too does the Milky Way's gravitational pull affect the stars in the constellation of Sagittarius.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: ବୈଜ୍ଞାନିକମାନେ ଏହି ସିଦ୍ଧାନ୍ତରେ ଉପନୀତ ହୋଇପାରିଥିଲେ ଯେ ଡାର୍କ ମ୍ୟାଟର୍ ଅନ୍ୟ ଡାର୍କ ମ୍ୟାଟର୍‌କୁ ନିୟମିତ ପଦାର୍ଥ ପରି ସମାନ ଭାବରେ ପ୍ରଭାବିତ କରେ।
mt: They have come up with the theory that dark matter affects dark matter the same way normal matter affects normal matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: ଏହି ତତ୍ତ୍ୱ ଅନୁଯାୟୀ ଏକ ନୀହାରିକା ଚାରିପଟେ ଥିବା ଅଧିକାଂଶ ଡାର୍କ ପଦାର୍ଥ ନୀହାରିକାର ଚାରିପଟେ ଏକ ପ୍ରକାରର ବଳୟ ଭାବରେ ଅଛି ଏବଂ ଏହା ଅନେକ ଛୋଟ ଛୋଟ କଣିକା ଦ୍ୱାରା ଗଠିତ।
mt: According to this theory, a dark matter halo around a galaxy is a kind of shell around the galaxy, and it is made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: ଟେଲିଭିଜନ୍‍ ରିପୋର୍ଟରେ ସେହି ଗଛରୁ ଧଳା ଧୁଆଁ ବାହାରିବା ଦେଖାଉଛି।
mt: The television report shows white smoke coming from the tree.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: ଉକ୍ତ ଉଦ୍ଭିଦ ଆଖପାଖରେ ରହୁଥିବା ବାସିନ୍ଦାମାନେ ଘର ଭିତରେ ରହିବା, ଏୟାର-କଣ୍ଡିସନର୍‍ ବନ୍ଦ କରିବା ଏବଂ ପାଇପ୍‍ ଜଳ ପାନ ନକରିବା ପାଇଁ ସ୍ଥାନୀୟ କର୍ତ୍ତୃପକ୍ଷ ଚେତାବନୀ ଦେଉଛନ୍ତି।
mt: Residents in the area have been advised to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners, and refrain from drinking tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: ଜାପାନର ନ୍ୟୁକ୍ଲିୟର୍‌ ବା ଆଣବିକ ଏଜେନ୍ସି ଅନୁଯାୟୀ, ଏହି କାରଖାନାରେ ତେଜଷ୍କ୍ରିୟ ସେସିୟମ୍ ଏବଂ ଆୟୋଡିନ୍ ଚିହ୍ନଟ କରାଯାଇଛି।
mt: According to Japan's Nuclear and Industrial Safety Agency, cesium and iodine have been detected at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: କର୍ତ୍ତୁପକ୍ଷ ଅନୁମାନ କରୁଛନ୍ତି ଯେ ଏହା ସାଇଟରେ ୟୁରାନିୟମ୍ ଇନ୍ଧନ ଥିବା ପାତ୍ରଗୁଡ଼ିକ ଫାଟି ଲିକ୍ ହେଉଥିବାକୁ ସୂଚିତ କରୁଛି।
mt: Authorities suspect the crash was caused by a fuel tank rupturing.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: ଡ଼ ଟୋନି ମଲ୍ ଦକ୍ଷିଣ ଆଫ୍ରିକାର କ୍ୱାଜୁଲୁ-ନାଟାଲ ଅଞ୍ଚଳରେ ଅତ୍ୟନ୍ତ ଔଷଧ ପ୍ରତିରୋଧକ ଯକ୍ଷ୍ମା (XDR-TB)ର ଆବିଷ୍କାର କରିଥିଲେ ।
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: ଏକ ସାକ୍ଷାତକାରରେ, ସେ କହିଥିଲେ, "ଅତ୍ୟଧିକ ମୃତ୍ୟୁ ହାର ଯୋଗୁଁ ନୂଆ ପରିବର୍ତ୍ତିତ ରୂପ ଅତ୍ୟଧିକ ଅସୁବିଧାଜନକ ଏବଂ ବିପଦଜନକ ଥିଲା।"
mt: In an interview, he said, "The high mortality rate made the new form very difficult and dangerous."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: ଡ଼ ମଲ୍ ଭାବୁଛନ୍ତି, ଡାକ୍ତରଖାନାରେ କିଛି ରୋଗୀ ଏବଂ ଅତି କମରେ ଦୁଇ ଜଣ ସ୍ୱାସ୍ଥ୍ୟ କର୍ମଚାରୀ କୀଟ ଦ୍ୱାରା ସଂକ୍ରମିତ ହୋଇଥାଇପାରନ୍ତି I
mt: Dr. Moll said, "Some patients and at least two hospital staff could have been infected by the bite of a mosquito."
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
